<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/public/services/{service_id}/slots"}

</MethodEndpoint>



List all available time slots for a service in a specific time range, for use on public booking interfaces.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"description":"When authenticating with a platform token, specifies the account ID for the request","example":"acct_1234567890","in":"header","name":"X-SavvyCal-Account","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"Service ID","example":"srv_123456789012","in":"path","name":"service_id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"Start of time range (ISO date format)","example":"\"2025-04-01\"","in":"query","name":"from","required":true,"schema":{"example":"2025-04-01","type":"string"}},{"description":"End of time range (ISO date format)","example":"\"2025-04-07\"","in":"query","name":"until","required":true,"schema":{"example":"2025-04-07","type":"string"}},{"description":"Time zone for the slots (IANA format)","example":"\"America/New_York\"","in":"query","name":"time_zone","required":false,"schema":{"default":"Etc/UTC","type":"string"}},{"description":"Filter slots by specific provider ID","example":"prv_123456789012","in":"query","name":"provider_id","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
